Posts.Content: Jun 3, 2015 11:44PM marsen02 wrote: eight years with mets now. Original dx was in 2000 when I was 37, mets dx in 2007. Initially mets to my liver and bones. In 2011 I was dxed with mets to bone marrow. Been doing pretty good on hormonals, but getting ready for a treatment change this month. My husband and I just got back from a nine day trip to Scotland! Marie St Louis, MO
